name: Raw Brawler
description:
A 3rd Person Spectacle Fighter to become the Raw Brawler! 

Made in One Week!

Features:

- Character Customisation

- 6 Stages

- Endless Brawling Action!

The goal of this project was to plan and implement a short game to completion.

This Project began on 31/12/2018 til 06/01/2019.

Raw Brawler was Developed By Thai Daye, James Vigor and Jordan Crownshaw.

Thai Daye - Technical artist

James Vigor - Programmer

Jordan Crownshaw - Animator

Cameron Messam - Musician 

Diana Buzea - Logo Art
